txt.en: Attention jewellers,\n\nThere is a great danger to our people that comes from the terrifying fangs of the spiders found throughout the Lone-lands. We require ruby rings of willpower, which have a quality that strengthens the wearer's body. If you can craft these items, please deliver some to Léoflac at our encampment at Ost Guruth.

'This is beautiful. I will be certain to see that our people receive the rings. It is likely that they will protect them from the spiders and perhaps prevent needless death.\n\n'Thank you for doing this.'
'Is there an undertaking that you are currently working on for the Eglain? Perhaps you should complete the order before returning to me....'

Spiders are a great danger to the Eglain. They have thus put out a request to jewellers to create ruby rings of willpower that they might distribute to their people in an effort to defend them from the spider's wrath. The rings will make Eglan bodies healthier and give them strength against the spiders found throughout the Lone-lands.
Collected a ruby ring of willpower
Deliver the ruby ring of willpower to Léoflac

Craft a ruby ring of willpower and deliver it to Léoflac at the Eglan-encampment at Ost Guruth.\n\nDefending their people from the spiders of the Lone-lands is one goal of the Eglain. If they can find crafters able to create ruby rings of willpower, they believe that they can protect a good number of their people.
Collect a ruby ring of willpower
